column4: @Anyone :: Need helping setting up a second Xserver on an system with compiz-fusion and using an ATI card. Currently launching another xserver hardlocks the machine, everything else (compiz, 3d effects, games) work great!!
R2LM:: Add another line by itself at the end, that has "quiet" listed again
Thanks, I have that too... that's why I'm not sure why I still see all the startup messages. Any other ideas?
Sorry, other than that I don't. When i had the default quiet splash, and the 4th line quiet by itself (also by default) I saw none of that. So it's outta my range of experience
